document.full_text: al qaeda said it would soon release an audio tape from osama bin laden, made a week before he was killed by u.s. forces, the group said in a statement confirming his death released on islamist forums friday.
document.title: al qaeda says to release bin laden audio tape soon
lines_and_colors: al qaeda said it would soon release an audio tape from osama bin laden, made a week before he was killed by u.s. forces, the group said in a statement confirming his death released on islamist forums friday.
